name: Dream of Grandma
description:
Sage misses her Grandma who went missing in a mysterious disaster. After many years trying, she finally makes contact. Help Sage reconnect with her Grandma!

A MechJam III game by:

  • Erik Behar
  • Paige Tritschler
  • War Osman
  • Bad Muchacho B

Controls: 

  • WASD to move. 
  • Mouse to orbit camera around character. 
  • Mouse click to advance dialogs.
  • Spacebar to jump or climb. 
  • Shift to sprint. 
  • E to enter/exit Mech.

Hints:

  • Lost ? Look for the shiny blue waypoints
  • You got to climb to get that gas, look for yellow footholds
